about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Professional family team
about.description: We are a friendly family team with years of cleaning experience. Our mission is to make your home clean and cozy so you can enjoy time with your loved ones. We work with eco-friendly products and modern equipment.

general.title: General Cleaning
general.description: Complete apartment cleaning with thorough treatment of all surfaces, windows and hard-to-reach places

maintenance.title: Maintenance Cleaning
maintenance.description: Regular cleaning to maintain cleanliness and order in your home

afterRepair.title: Post-Renovation Cleaning
afterRepair.description: Professional cleaning of premises from construction dust and renovation residues

maid.title: Maid Service

prices.title: Our Prices
prices.subtitle: Transparent pricing without overpayments

locations.title: Locations We Serve
locations.subtitle: Professional cleaning in your city
locations.ifDescription: Main focus of our work. We provide all types of cleaning services in the capital of Prykarpattia. Professional cleaning of apartments, houses and offices in Ivano-Frankivsk.
